0.name: Nina N.
0.text: The Akashic Records open a gateway for me: to deep spiritual wisdom and experiences of past lives. Mysterious yet tangible – a mirror of my soul. For me, the perfect balance between depth and clarity.

1.name: Nicolas M.
1.text: The heart healing was gentle and incredibly powerful. After just one session, I felt a deep shift - as if something had opened inside me. I sensed clarity and connection like I hadn't in a long time. The space Coco creates is full of warmth and intuition. It gave me the courage to go deeper and meet my true self.

2.name: Michelle H.
2.text: You bridge the worldly and the spiritual in a wonderful way - clear, grounded and full of light. In your mindful, loving presence, a space emerges where genuine healing can happen. Your work has truly moved me forward. Professionally and personally, you are a real gift.

3.name: Simone P.
3.text: During the heart healing I felt a warmth like a hand on my heart - tears, calm, a deep arriving. After the session came strong, clear feelings and insights - real transformation. It’s the most intense and effective form of healing I have ever experienced. With Coco I feel seen, safely accompanied and met without judgment.

meta.title: Akashic Reading, Heart Healing & Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
meta.description: Back to you: Heart Healing, Ontological Coaching and Akashic Records readings - empathetic, clear and at eye level in Zurich & online.

og.title: Akashic Reading, Heart Healing & Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: Guidance with depth: Heart Healing, Coaching and Akashic Records for clarity, balance and real change.

twitter.title: Akashic Reading, Heart Healing & Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: Heart Healing, Coaching & Akashic Records in Zurich & online.

s1.title: Welcome to your journey back to yourself
s1.kicker: I accompany you on your path to inner clarity and self-empowerment
s1.p1: You may have felt a quiet longing within you for a long time - a longing for clarity, for arriving, for yourself.
s1.p2: I accompany you on your inner journey - with ontological coaching and energy work. Together we dissolve blockages, clarify old patterns and create space for change, healing and new possibilities. For more clarity, inner strength and a life aligned with your essence.
s1.p3: My work is not about higher, faster, further - but about depth, authenticity and awareness. In your pace, in your way.
s1.p4: I support you in letting go of inner weight, regaining trust in yourself and living your own truth.
s1.p5: You are welcome - exactly as you are. And perhaps your journey back to yourself begins right here.

s2.title: Ontological Coaching - back to your true self
s2.p1: Ontological coaching goes deeper than classic coaching:
s2.p2: It doesn’t just ask: “What do I want to do?”, but “Who am I - and how do I want to live?”
s2.p3: At the center is your being: your inner stance, your language, your thinking and feeling.
s2.p4: Real change doesn’t arise from doing more - but from awareness.
s2.p5: Change doesn’t start outside - it starts within you.

s3.title: Akashic Reading - messages from your soul
s3.p1: Sometimes we reach a turning point in life and feel: clarity is needed. An Akashic reading opens a space to understand more deeply who you are and what your soul truly wants.
s3.p2: You receive insights into the origins of your fears, patterns and blockages - and recognize why certain experiences happen in your life.
s3.p3: What truly moves you becomes visible - and what can bring you into your power now.
s3.p4: The soul reading offers orientation, awareness and trust - for your path, your decision, yourself.

s4.title: Hopi Heart Healing - your heart knows the way
s4.p1: Hopi Heart Healing is a powerful yet gentle form of energy work rooted in the wisdom of the Hopi people. Old experiences, disappointments or deep emotional wounds can keep us from being connected to ourselves.
s4.p2: You reconnect with inner peace, self-love and heart power. This deep connection enables a fresh start - within yourself, with yourself.
s4.p3: This heart work opens spaces - for healing, connection and trust - and for your very own way.

s5.title: Chakra Clearing - bring your energy into balance
s5.p1: Your seven chakras are the energy centers of your body - they influence how you feel, think and perceive yourself. Stress, old emotions or inner restlessness can block these centers.
s5.p2: During Chakra Clearing your chakras are gently cleansed, activated and brought back into balance. Your energy can flow freely again - for more clarity, ease and inner harmony.
s5.p3: Feel what it’s like to be fully with yourself again.

s6.title: Spiritual Spine Alignment - back to your center, back to your power
s6.p1: Return to your natural alignment - for balance in body, mind and soul. Spiritual spine alignment supports you in coming into your full strength - physically, emotionally and energetically.
s6.p2: Your spine is the center of your being - it carries you, aligns you and lets your life force flow. When this flow is blocked, symptoms can arise on both physical and emotional levels.
s6.p3: This method sets your energy in motion again - gentle, holistic and deeply effective. Experience alignment, clarity and inner healing.

s7.title: doTERRA AromaTouch® - deep relaxation with essential oils
s7.p1: Gentle touch meets the power of pure plant essences. doTERRA AromaTouch® combines mindful touch with 100% pure essential oils from doTERRA.
s7.p2: Specific areas of the body are stimulated to reduce stress, support the immune system and restore inner balance. The method works physically and emotionally - bringing you into a deeply relaxed state.
s7.p3: A nourishing experience for body, mind and soul. Let go. Recharge. Arrive - in yourself.

meta.title: About me
meta.description: My path, my values, my work: social worker & coach - why I accompany people on their way to clarity, healing and self-empowerment.

og.title: About me | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: Background & stance: heart healing, coaching and Akashic Records - human, clear, authentic.

twitter.title: About me | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: Who I am and how I work - with depth and connection.

intro.title: About me
intro.p1:
From early on, I’ve been interested in what moves people on the inside and how real change actually happens. Questions of justice, inner freedom and self-determination have shaped my path from the very beginning. Driven by this, I studied Social Work with the goal of accompanying people through challenging life phases in a professional, respectful and equal way.

In my work, I’ve had the privilege of getting to know many different life realities. I supported unaccompanied minor refugees, worked with adults in the asylum sector, assisted people affected by substance dependence — in therapy, harm reduction and prevention — and accompanied women, children and adolescents through sensitive transitions and crisis periods. Every encounter has taught me how much strength, vulnerability and wisdom lives within each person.
intro.p2:
My own path has also been shaped by highs and lows: personal crises, new beginnings, inner transformation processes. Especially formative were my almost eight years in Latin America. That time changed me deeply — as a human being and as a professional. There I learned to relate to life with more trust, depth and connection.

Over the years, it became clear to me: true change does not begin on the outside. It begins where we meet ourselves honestly. This path isn’t always comfortable — but it is healing. During this phase, coaching and energy work entered my life. They helped me recognize old patterns, release inner blocks and come closer to my own truth.
intro.p3: Today, all of these experiences flow into my work. I combine professional competence with presence, life experience and a refined sense for what truly matters. In my coaching and energy work, I create a safe space where you can feel seen, heard and taken seriously — and where personal growth and inner stability become possible. I am convinced: Every person already carries the power for change within. Sometimes all it takes is the right space — and mindful support — for that power to unfold.

right: Training: Heart healing, Akashic Records reading, Spiritual Spinal Alignment, Chakra Clearing

left: Escuela de Formación de Líderes, Buenos Aires, Argentina
University of Applied Sciences Social Work

meta.title: Ontological Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
meta.description: Clarity, focus and real implementation: coaching at eye level for professional & personal topics - in Zurich & online.

og.title: Ontological Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: From insight to action: broaden perspectives, make decisions, move into action.

twitter.title: Ontological Coaching | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: Create clarity, set priorities, move into action.

alt1.title: Ontological Coaching - change begins in being
alt1.body:
Ontological coaching accompanies you on a deeper level - not only in what you do, but in who you are at your core. The focus is not on quickly solving problems, but on the honest question:

Who am I - and how do I shape my life from this inner truth?

Instead of working on the surface, we look together at your being:

How you think, speak, feel - and how you perceive the world. This is where the key to real, sustainable change lies.

Ontological coaching is not a "quick program". It is a conscious journey back to yourself - at your pace, at your depth, in your own rhythm. It opens new perspectives, clarity and access to what lies within you, but may still be hidden.

For clarity. For connection. For your authentic life.

alt2.title: Coaching as companionship on your path back to yourself:
items: gain clarity about your own path
discover your strengths and values
dissolve personal blocks and develop action strategies
create sustainable change
resolve inner and outer conflicts
strengthen your coping strategies
unfold your personal potential

centered.title: Coaching with clarity - for real change
centered.body:
My coaching is based on deep trust - in your abilities, your inner wisdom and your very own path. I am convinced: every person carries the potential within to grow and shape life consciously.

In my work, I combine effective emotional and mental methods from various approaches - mindful, individual and solution-oriented. This creates space for new perspectives, clear thinking and conscious action. A path that brings you closer to yourself.

The coaching process is as unique as you are - tailor-made and aligned with your needs. Together we look at what blocks you from within and develop ways for you to gain clarity and step into your power again. Often it only takes a new perspective to see further.

Through targeted questions we bring light to your topic - especially where you may be too close to recognize answers clearly. I accompany you with heart, clarity and a safe space for real change.

The only prerequisite: the willingness to let go of the old - and allow the new.

steps.title: The coaching process - what to expect
steps.subtitle: Change begins with a first step. Here is how my coaching process works:

items.title: Free initial call
items.body: In the first conversation we get to know each other (approx. 20 minutes). You tell me what moves you - and we clarify how I can best support you. This get-to-know-you is non-binding and free of charge.

items.title: Individual coaching sessions
items.body: In the sessions we work specifically on your topics. We develop solutions and strategies that fit you - and take you step by step toward your goals.

items.title: Reflection & further development
items.body: At the end we look back together: what has changed? What carries you forward? And how can you stay connected with yourself on your path?

steps.footer:
This path can be emotionally moving - and that is exactly where its power lies:

In the end, a deep feeling of clarity, lightness and new energy often emerges.

freeConsult.title: 1:1 Free call for clarity
freeConsult.subtitle: Curious but unsure? I invite you to a free get-to-know call.

meta.title: Akashic Records Reading
meta.description: Clarity on blocks, patterns and next steps: compassionate Akashic Records readings in Zurich & online.

og.title: Akashic Records Reading | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: Answers with depth: Akashic Records reading for orientation, healing and inner alignment.

twitter.title: Akashic Records Reading | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: See the connections, dissolve blocks, find your path.

alt1.title: Akashic Records - clarity about your path and your blocks
alt1.body:
The Akashic Records are a subtle, energetic field - often referred to as the "universal memory". It holds everything a soul has ever experienced, felt and learned - across space and time. In many spiritual traditions, the Akashic Records are considered a source of deep wisdom, clarity and healing. When we connect with them, we gain access to higher knowledge - beyond the mind.

The messages from the Akasha are always loving, precise and supportive. They help us understand patterns, dissolve blocks and reconnect with our inner truth.

The Akashic Records remind you who you truly are - on a soul level.

alt2.title: Insights that remind you - and move you forward
alt2.bodyIntro: An Akashic reading can offer deep insights and new perspectives - exactly where you are in life right now. It opens a space where you may recognize and understand yourself on a soul level. You can:
items: gain a deeper understanding of your current life feeling
see your life task and soul path more clearly
understand and dissolve recurring patterns
gently transform entanglements, blocks or fears
develop new perspectives on inner and outer challenges
find more inner clarity and energetic alignment
strengthen the connection to your soul and trust it again
alt2.bodyOutro: For people who feel: there is more - and I am ready to see it.

topics.title: Possible topics in an Akashic reading
topics.subtitle: Here are some topics that can be addressed in a reading:

columns.title: Love & partnership
items: Recognize and dissolve karmic entanglements
Understand causes and patterns in relationship conflicts
Clarify foreign influences
Recognize shared soul goals
Strengthen trust and respect in partnership
Recognize soulmates

columns.title: Career & vocation
items: Find your vocation
See and reach goals more clearly
Recognize karmic patterns in the work environment
Uncover blocking influences from the environment
Make decisions with inner clarity

columns.title: Family & ancestors
items: Recognize ancestral themes and intergenerational patterns
Dissolve entanglements with parents or children
Understand learning tasks within the family
Recognize and set boundaries against foreign influences

columns.title: Health & body awareness
items: Attune to the body's messages
Emotional and energetic causes
Recognize physical complaints
Dissolve foreign influences energetically

columns.title: Finances & abundance
items: Understand karmic themes related to money and success
Recognize causes of financial blocks
Consciously activate energetic abundance

columns.title: Spirituality & soul connection
items: Recognize spiritual abilities and potentials
Deepen connection to spiritual guides
Strengthen intuitive perception

steps.title: How an Akashic reading works
steps.subtitle: Each reading is unique - just like you. Here's how I work and what to expect:

items.title: Preparation for the reading
items.body: Before each reading, I attune through a meditative connection to your soul and energetic field. I connect with your soul energy and your spiritual companions - always in alignment with your highest good.

items.title: Receiving the messages
items.body: During the reading, I receive intuitive, spiritual messages from your Akashic Records. These reveal deeper connections in your life path and provide answers that help you see more clearly and follow your way with more trust.

steps.footer: Your soul brings exactly the topics to light that matter now. I act as the messenger - clear, mindful and attentive. This creates a space for insight, healing and deep connection with yourself.

meta.title: Hopi Heart Healing
meta.description: Gentle heart healing for inner calm, connection and emotional clarity - in Zurich & online.

og.title: Hopi Heart Healing | Corinne Vanarelli
og.description: Open the heart, calm the nervous system, come back to yourself.

twitter.title: Hopi Heart Healing | Corinne Vanarelli
twitter.description: More calm, love and clarity - from the heart.

alt1.title: Hopi Heart Healing - your heart knows your way
alt1.body:
Hopi heart healing is a gentle yet deeply effective method from the ancient knowledge of the Hopi. It touches your heart - and with it the level of your soul and subtle body. This is where the deepest wounds, but also your greatest inner strength, often reside - and where heart healing begins.

Step by step, you may reopen your heart - free from old wounds, fears or blocks that unconsciously keep you from allowing love, abundance and genuine connection into your life.

This energetic work supports you in releasing emotional burdens - not only your own, but also inherited patterns from your ancestral line.

This creates space for clarity, lightness and true heart connection - with yourself and with others.

alt2.title: When your heart calls for healing
alt2.bodyIntro: This healing work is for everyone who wishes to be touched and supported on a heart level - especially in times of change, inner restlessness or emotional strain. It is especially suitable for people who:
items: feel inwardly blocked or emotionally exhausted
wish to lovingly release old wounds, grief or fears
want to reconnect with their heart energy
seek peace with themselves and their past
long for emotional healing and inner peace
want to clarify attachment issues, relationship pain or old wounds
wish for a deeper connection with themselves and others
suffer from burnout, depression, grief or unexplained complaints
are in a phase of change, crisis or reorientation
as a child (or for their child) want to strengthen emotional safety - e.g., after parents' separation

steps.title: How a Hopi heart healing unfolds

items.title: Arriving & attuning
items.body: At the beginning you take time to come to rest at your own pace and arrive within yourself. In a short conversation we look together at what is moving you right now - emotionally, spiritually or physically. This creates a mindful space where everything may be present.

items.title: Heart work & energetic guidance
items.body: You may lie down or sit comfortably - and simply receive. I connect with the source of Hopi energy and work intuitively through your heart center. The energy flows exactly where it is needed - lovingly, clearly and often deeply touching. Old wounds, blocks or inherited patterns may gently dissolve.

items.title: After the session
items.body: After the session you have space to feel in peace - with yourself, without hurry. In a mindful exchange we reflect on what has shown up. You receive impulses on how to integrate the experience into your everyday life and carry the effect of the heart healing further. The energy often continues to work for days - quietly yet deeply. Many people then feel more inner peace, a wide, open heart connection and more loving feelings toward themselves.

steps.footer:
Give yourself time. Drink enough water, allow yourself rest and listen to your body.

Healing does not happen under pressure - it unfolds when you give it space.

freeConsult.subtitle: Curious but unsure? I invite you to a free get-to-know call.

meta.title: Chakra Clearing
meta.description: Cleanse and harmonize energy centers: more clarity, balance and vitality - as a session in Zurich or online.

og.title: Chakra Clearing
og.description: Dissolve blocks, get energy flowing, find your center.

twitter.title: Chakra Clearing
twitter.description: More clarity, balance and vitality - chakra by chakra.

alt1.title: Chakra Clearing - clarity, balance & new vitality
alt1.body:
Our seven main chakras are subtle energy centers along the spine. They influence our physical, emotional and mental well-being.

When these chakras fall out of balance - due to stress, emotional strain or external influences - it can lead to restlessness, exhaustion or a sense of inner emptiness.

A chakra clearing can strengthen you on all levels - energetically, emotionally and spiritually. You come back to yourself and feel what is truly alive within you.

Your energy is the key. Chakra clearing helps you let it flow freely again.

alt2.title: Chakra clearing gently brings your energy back into flow
items: find more inner calm and balance
experience a clear, powerful sense of energy
strengthen your intuition and self-perception
release emotional strain
bring more lightness into everyday life
deepen body and soul awareness

steps.title: Chakra clearing process

items.title: Preparation
items.body: Before we begin, you take time to arrive within yourself. In a short conversation we look together at what is moving you and which topic wants space. You may open inwardly to what wants to be seen, felt and released - in your tempo, in your way. Everything is welcome. Nothing must.

items.title: During the session
items.intro: In a quiet, protected space, you may come to rest - sitting or lying down, as feels right for you. I work mindfully along your seven main chakras and support the flow of energy through intuitive perception and gentle energetic impulses. This may:
list: gently relieve emotional, mental and physical tension
items.outro: This application offers new clarity, inner spaciousness and a palpable sense of connection with yourself. You may feel warmth, tingling, inner images or deep calm - every person experiences the session differently.

items.title: After the session
items.body: Many people report more lightness, inner clarity and a deep sense of connection with themselves. After the chakra clearing, the energy continues to work - gently and in your own tempo. Energy work often sets deeper processes in motion that may unfold in the following days.

steps.footer:
Give yourself time. Drink enough water, allow rest and listen to your body.

Healing does not happen under pressure - it unfolds when you give it space.

freeConsult.subtitle: Curious but unsure? I invite you to a free get-to-know call.

meta.title: Spiritual Spinal Alignment
meta.description: Energetic alignment: dissolve blocks, find orientation and experience more lightness & energy in everyday life.

og.title: Spiritual Spinal Alignment
og.description: Bring body, mind and soul into balance - gently and holistically.

twitter.title: Spiritual Spinal Alignment
twitter.description: Alignment & balance - for more freedom in body and life.

alt1.title: Spiritual spinal alignment - change begins in being
alt1.body:
Spiritual spinal alignment is a gentle yet deeply effective method that brings body, mind and soul back into harmony.

It is based on the understanding that our physical body and our energy system are inseparably connected.

Our spine is far more than the physical center of our upright being - it is a central energy channel, an inner tree of life through which strength, stability and alignment flow.

In spiritual alignment, your energy system is consciously brought into balance.

Blocks may release and the spine returns to its natural order - and with it your entire system.

alt2.title: Your spine as a key to inner alignment
items: suffer from physical complaints or chronic tension
wish to dissolve emotional blocks or old patterns
long for inner balance and lightness
want to feel energy, vitality and joy of life again
seek a holistic method addressing body, mind and soul
alt2.outro: Inner alignment frees new life energy - it acts not only on your spine but on every single cell of your body.

steps.title: Session process - spiritual spinal alignment
steps.subtitle: Each session takes place in a protected, mindful space - focused on your physical, emotional and energetic balance.

items.title: Arriving & pre-talk
items.body: At the beginning you take time to arrive within yourself. In a short conversation we clarify what is currently moving you and whether there are specific topics or complaints to include in the session.

items.title: Attunement & energetic alignment
items.body: You lie down or sit comfortably while I connect with your energy system. Intuitively and without touch, I work along your spine and guide energy where blocks are felt. Your system responds gently - alignment happens through consciousness, not physical manipulation.

items.title: After the session
items.body: We take time for a conscious close. You can feel what has moved - and we discuss how to gently integrate the experience into everyday life. The energy often accompanies you for a while - gently yet sustainably.

steps.footer:
Give yourself time. Drink enough water, gift yourself rest and listen to your body.

Healing does not happen under pressure - it unfolds when you give it space.

meta.title: doTERRA AromaTouch
meta.description: AromaTouch technique: mindful application with essential oils for relaxation, regeneration and nervous system balance.

og.title: doTERRA AromaTouch
og.description: A soothing time-out for body, mind and senses - gentle, deep, balancing.

alt1.title: AromaTouch technique - a mindful application for body and senses
alt1.body:
The doTERRA AromaTouch™ technique works holistically - on physical, emotional and energetic levels. Combining high-quality essential oils with mindful touch brings your whole system into a state of deep regeneration.

It was developed to relax, regenerate and bring body, mind and soul into balance in a natural way.

During the application, eight specifically selected doTERRA essential oils are gently applied along the spine and on the foot reflex zones. With targeted touch, the oils are worked into the system - to reduce stress, support the immune system and promote emotional balance.

A soothing time-out for your nervous system - deeply relaxing, strengthening and harmonizing.

alt2.title: Back into balance - with the power of essential oils
items: balance of the autonomic nervous system
support of the immune system
prevention or reduction of inflammatory responses in the body
regeneration through mental and physical deep relaxation
brings body, mind and soul back into balance
alt2.strong: Many find the treatment deeply relaxing, clarifying and at the same time energizing.

centered.title: AromaTouch technique - how it works
centered.bodyIntro: The application takes place in a quiet, protected setting. You remain clothed; only the back and feet are gently uncovered. In a fixed sequence, eight selected doTERRA oils are gently applied along the spine and on the foot reflex zones. Oils used include:
oils: On Guard - supportive for your immune system
Aromatouch - relaxing for muscles and mind
centered.bodyOutro: The only prerequisite: the willingness to let go of the old - and allow the new.
